genresAdvancedInfo.name: ngoni
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Ngoni - A traditional West African string instrument, the ngoni produces a distinctive sound that is both earthy and hypnotic. Its music is characterized by intricate rhythms and melodic patterns that showcase the instrument's unique tonality. Ngoni music is often used in cultural ceremonies and celebrations, as well as in contemporary music genres such as blues and jazz.
